definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Above and below the lions and bulls were wreaths of hammered work.
sentences.chinese: 邊上有小座，獅子和牛以下有垂下的瓔珞。

sentences.english: He is draping the banner from the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 他使旗幟成褶皺狀從陽臺上垂下。

sentences.english: Nick’s head drops, knowing what he has to do.
sentences.chinese: Nick垂下了頭，他知道他必須要做什麼。

sentences.english: Lifted an eye to sweep 2 people's one eye in June, again pendency, can be not strange?
sentences.chinese: 六月擡眼掃了兩人一眼，又垂下，可不奇麼？

sentences.english: She has high nose, jet-black straight hair hang down her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她高鼻樑，烏黑的直髮垂下她的腰部。

sentences.english: And tonight, with more theatrical touches, the curtain came down.
sentences.chinese: 而今晚，隨着更多的精彩表演，大幕徐徐垂下。

sentences.english: Can finally just lightly of pendency head, what don't also say.
sentences.chinese: 可終只是輕輕的垂下頭，什麼也沒說。

sentences.english: And each slow dusk a drawing-down of blinds.
sentences.chinese: 每個緩慢的黃昏爲盲者垂下簾窗。

sentences.english: He bowed his head, but I saw him flicker another puzzled look at me.
sentences.chinese: 他垂下了頭，但我看到他又困惑地瞥了我一眼。

sentences.english: Cowardly as ever, I shifted my hair over my right shoulder to hide my face.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至怯懦到把頭髮攏到右肩上垂下來，擋住我的臉。

sentences.english: On the frames, both above and below the lions and oxen, there were wreaths of beveled work.
sentences.chinese: 邊上有小座，獅子和牛以下有垂下的瓔珞。

sentences.english: Earrings gold, too, and hanging down to her shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 金耳環，也和她垂下肩膀。

sentences.english: Then Rapunzel let down the braids of her hair, and the enchantress climbed up to her.
sentences.chinese: 萵苣姑娘立刻垂下她的髮辮，女巫順着它爬了上去。

sentences.english: Then he thrust me away, and leant his head down silently.
sentences.chinese: 然後他把我推開，默默地垂下了頭。

sentences.english: De Mello lowered her Ruger and stroked the girl's face to comfort her.
sentences.chinese: 梅洛垂下魯格步槍，撫摸着女孩的臉，安慰她。

sentences.english: A flap of skin was hanging from his body, exposing his spine and internal organs.
sentences.chinese: 有一塊皮從他身上垂下來，露出了脊骨和內臟。

definition: to raise one's head/to perk up
(of a breeze) to make (hair, leaves, clothing etc) sway gently/to ruffle
